problem: 如图,将直角三角板60°角的顶点方在圆心O上,斜边和一直角边分别与⊙O相交于A、B两点,P是优弧AB上任意一点(与A、B不重合),则∠APB=()
answer:
解:由题意得,∠AOB=60°,
则∠APB=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=30°．
故选:A．
comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理的知识,解答本题的关键是熟练掌握圆周角定理的内容．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the vertex of the angle of the right-angled triangle plate N_0 is on the center O, and the hypotenuse and the right-angle edge intersect with ⊙O at two vertices A and B respectively. P is any vertex on the superior arc AB (not coincident with A and B) , Then ∠APB = ()
